title: Celestial Trivar
description: A mystical character design blending celestial themes with fantasy elements. This piece explores color theory and character personality through visual design.

title: Ethereal Landscapes
description: A serene landscape exploration featuring dreamlike environments and atmospheric perspective. This series demonstrates environmental storytelling and mood composition.

title: Text Effects Highlights
summary: A collection of text effect designs done in Photoshop
description: Before I became more focused on 3D art, I created a variety of text effect designs for gaming channels and brands. This collection showcases my early work in typography and graphic design.

title: Radiant Kingdom Model
description: A high-poly 3D character model featuring detailed clothing, intricate accessories, and professional rigging. Created for game and animation applications.

title: Fantasy Architecture
description: A detailed fantasy fortress environment showcasing architectural design, lighting setup, and material work. Perfect for game level design and visualization.

title: Creature Design Study
description: An intricate creature design featuring complex topology, anatomical accuracy, and artistic interpretation. Includes turnaround views and material variations.
